textBeforeTable: 1) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) on your own? (Q1OWN) All frequencies are raw numbers (no weights used). textAfterTable: [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 2) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) with family? (Q1FAMILY) TOTAL % 1) Never 443 52.9 2) Once or twice 212 25.3 3) A few times 86 10.3 4) Often, but not daily 63 7.5 5) At least daily 34 4.1 Missing 48   TOTAL 838 100.0 [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 3) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) in connection with a group devoted specifically to Bible study? (Q1BSTUDY) TOTAL % 1) Never 411 47.6 2) Once or twice 328 38.0 3) A few times 71 8.2 4) Often, but not daily 44 5.1
